participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Welcoming and friendly, enjoys engaging with others.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves to explore new cuisines and cultures.
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.
